title: Over 15,000 startups, 2,00,000 jobs in new tech in Kerala within next 5 years: CM Pinarayi Vijayan - India Today
content: Over 15,000 startups, 2,00,000 jobs in new tech in Kerala within next 5 years: CM Pinarayi Vijayan  India Today
description: Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan said that the state government has set a goal of having over 15,000 startups and 2,00,000 jobs in new technologies in five years.
